title: Benchmarking EfficientTAM on FMO datasets.
description: This file contains information for FMOX, and Falling Object, FMOV2, TbD, TbD-3D datasets.

files.name: FMOX_All4.json
files.file_definition: All Falling Object, FMOV2, TbD and TbD-3D dataset annotations in a JSON file.

files.name: FMOX_fmov2.json
files.file_definition: Only FMOV2 dataset annotations in a JSON file due to annotation format differences.

files.name: FMOX_tbd_whole_sequence.json
files.file_definition: Only TbD dataset annotations in a JSON file due to annotation format differences.

files.name: FMOX_tbd.json
files.file_definition: TbD annotations in a JSON file, annotations obtained with fall_and_tbd3d datasets.

files.name: FMOX_fall_and_tbd3d.json
files.file_definition: Falling Object and TbD-3D dataset annotations in a JSON file.

files.name: FMOX_All4_statistics.csv
files.file_definition: CSV file from FMOX json to indicate Total Frame Number, FMO Exists Frame Number, Object Size Levels.

files.name: EfficientTAM_averageTIoU.csv
files.file_definition: EfficientTAM TIoU metric evaluation results for each sequence using FMOX_All4.json.

files.name: create_jsons_main.ipynb
files.file_definition: To create JSONS file you could prefer this notebook or https://github.com/CVMLmu/FMOX/blob/main/FMOX-code/create-FMOX/main.py.

files.name: fmox_main.ipynb
files.file_definition: To use FMOX JSONS you could prefer this notebook or https://github.com/CVMLmu/FMOX/blob/main/FMOX-code/use-FMOX/fmox_main.py.

files.name: download_datasets.py
files.file_definition: The dataset is downloaded and extracted into a folder named "Original_Dataset".

files.name: create_fmov2_json.py
files.file_definition: Apply contour detection on FMOv2 dataset mask images to obtain bounding boxes and calculate object size labels.

files.name: create_tbd_json.py
files.file_definition: Obtain bounding boxes and calculate object size labels for FMOX_tbd_whole_sequence.json.

files.name: dataset_loader/create_json_via_benchmark_loader.py
files.file_definition: Calculate object size labels, create a JSON file for Falling Object, (option2) Tbd and TbD-3D datasets.

files.name: FMOX_all4_json_to_CSV.py
files.file_definition: Use this file to create FMOX_All4_statistics.csv .

files.name: efficientam_evaluation.py
files.file_definition: Use this file to create EfficientTAM_averageTIoU.csv.

files.name: access_json_bboxes.py
files.file_definition: Access bounding boxes from FMOX JSON annotation file.

files.name: combine_all_mask_to_single_img.py
files.file_definition: To analysis the segmentation masks (FMOv2 dataset) (e.g. trajectory) combine all into single mask image.

files.name: rle_to_seg_mask_img.py
files.file_definition: Convert FMOv2 Run-Length Encoded (RLE) text files to mask images

files.name: csv_to_graphics.py
files.file_definition: Various kind of visualization functions : Bar plot, Scatter plot, Box plot etc.

dataset_papers.title: The world of fast moving objects
dataset_papers.publisher: IEEE/CVF Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (CVPR)

dataset_papers.title: Intra-frame object tracking by deblatting
dataset_papers.publisher: IEEE/CVF International Conference on Computer Vision Workshops

dataset_papers.title: Sub-Frame Appearance and 6D Pose Estimation of Fast Moving Objects
dataset_papers.publisher: IEEE/CVF Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (CVPR)
